argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpasscan1.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpasscan1.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_grporinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( N ` A ) e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_grpolinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) G ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) G A ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( N ` A ) e. X ) -> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) e. X ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 12 | 10, 11, 3 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) e. X /\ A e. X /\ ( N ` A ) e. X ) ) |
| 13 | 1 | #P_grpolcan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) e. X /\ A e. X /\ ( N ` A ) e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) G A ) <-> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) = A ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) G A ) <-> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) = A ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) = A ) |
